description: Full grooming services including bathing, trimming, and styling for different breeds to ensure pets look their best.

faqs.question: How often should my pet be groomed?
faqs.answer: The frequency depends on the breed and hair length of your pet. Generally, pets should be groomed every 4-8 weeks.

faqs.question: Can I book a grooming service online?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can book grooming services through the Petofy platform by choosing a groomer and scheduling an appointment.

faqs.question: What grooming services are included?
faqs.answer: Our grooming packages include bathing, haircuts, nail trimming, ear cleaning, and more.

additional_info.title: Specialized Grooming for Different Breeds
additional_info.details: Our groomers are trained to handle the specific grooming needs of various breeds.

additional_info.title: Mobile Grooming Services
additional_info.details: We offer mobile grooming services to provide convenience for pet owners who prefer at-home grooming.
